document.full_text: top seed caroline wozniacki advanced to the semi-finals in indian wells thursday when her opponent victoria azarenka of belarus retired because of a hip injury when trailing 3-0.
document.title: wozniacki and sharapova to meet in semis
lines_and_colors: top seed caroline wozniacki advanced to the semi-finals in indian wells thursday when her opponent victoria azarenka of belarus retired because of a hip injury when trailing 3-0.
